name: Battleground on the Scorpion Island
description:
This is not  a simple shooter game. This is a big open world survival shooter Battle Royal game.  You need to survive on a big island, collect the weapons and other items what help to you. The battleground constantly decreasing and you need to fight that you survive the battle. Offline and online multiplayer modes with other players and with bots. No ADs, no microtransactions, you can collect all weapons, armors,  items!

Controls: 

Move: WASD
Run: Shift + move
Jump: Space
Crouch: C
Map: M
Shot: LMB
Craft: E
Inventory: TAB
TPS-FPS view: V
Stat: N

Battle to the last man standing!
